short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for GitHub! Pull in an AI assistant next to your code to make your work more productive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your GitHub experience by integrating ChatGPT into the GitHub UI.

Developers spend magnitudes more time reading code than they ever do writing code so use this extension to save yourself time and level up as a developer.

* Open ChatGPT write next to your source code and save time copy/pasting.
* Prompt Macros save time writing out common prompts.
* Privacy focused. Your code, prompts, and completions are only ever stored locally on your computer
* Bring Your Own OpenAI API key: only pay for what you use
